definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Total settlement of composite foundation still decreases with the length of column.
sentences.chinese: 但地基的總體沉降量仍然隨樁長增加而線性減小。

sentences.english: The site must be levelled before it is built upon.
sentences.chinese: 建房前要先把地基墊平。

sentences.english: “Found down in the Dirksen excavation, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “德克森中心挖地基的時候發現的，”他說。

sentences.english: So they used pinewood as the foundation.
sentences.chinese: 所以建房子的人就採用松木作爲地基。

sentences.english: The solution of Finite Element Method and Rigid Bar Method calculating foundation pressure is adopted on the pier pilebox foundation.
sentences.chinese: 用有限單元鏈杆解法，計算墩樁箱形基礎地基反力。

sentences.english: So the reinforcing area is consist by natural foundation and reinforcement body.
sentences.chinese: 加固區是由天然地基和增強體兩部分組成的人工地基。

sentences.english: So the reinforcing area is consist by natural foundation and reinforcement body.
sentences.chinese: 加固區是由天然地基和增強體兩部分組成的人工地基。

sentences.english: The technique of high-pressure gunite is applied to the foundation anti-seepage and reinforcement engineering and outstanding achievements were acquired.
sentences.chinese: 高壓噴射灌漿進行地基防滲加固，取得了顯著的成就。

sentences.english: First of all, space is not under a uniform hazard from ground-based weapons.
sentences.chinese: 首先，太空各處受到地基武器的威脅程度並不相同。

sentences.english: The bearing capacity behavoir of foundation is studied from different ang…
sentences.chinese: 即從不同角度探討了複合地基的承力性狀。

sentences.english: The design of replacement underlayer thickness is crucial to the replacement method of ground treatment.
sentences.chinese: 換土墊層厚度設計是換填法地基處理設計的關鍵。

sentences.english: It is very important to pay attention to the physical and mechanical qualities of the rock foundation and the architectonic geological setting.
sentences.chinese: 應充分考慮岩石地基的物理力學性質及構造地質背景。

sentences.english: Cushion is a core part in the rigid and semirigid composite foundation.
sentences.chinese: 褥墊層是剛性樁和半剛性樁複合地基的核心技術之一。

sentences.english: Foundation soil is usually considered to be rigid in the aseismic engineering design.
sentences.chinese: 在建築結構的抗震工程設計中通常假定地基爲剛性的。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the stability of pipes conveying fluid on elastic foundation.
sentences.chinese: 研究彈性地基上輸液管的穩定性。

sentences.english: You need a trench for the foundations at least 150mm high.
sentences.chinese: 你至少需要在150毫米高的地基上挖一條地溝。

definition: to build by laying bricks or stones
